system.effects: During Long-Term Repairs, repair 1d10+5 Hull Integrity instead of 1d5. Gain +10 to Silent Running maoeuvres. -10 to all Social Interaction Tests to anyone who knows what ship you are from.

description.value: During Long-Term Repairs, repair 1d10+5 Hull Integrity instead of 1d5. Gain +10 to Silent Running maoeuvres. -10 to all Social Interaction Tests to anyone who knows what ship you are from.
